Class BaseCompileToJarStepFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.jvm.java.BaseCompileToJarStepFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompileToJarStepFactory, RuleKeyAppendable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavacToJarStepFactory, KotlincToJarStepFactory, ScalacToJarStepFactory

    public abstract class BaseCompileToJarStepFactory
extends Object
implements CompileToJarStepFactory
    Provides a base implementation for post compile steps.
